allow: Bash(# Перевіряю fingerprint host ключа Main напряму ssh-keyscan -t rsa 192.168.88.1)
Bash(# Спробую через airport з sudo sudo /System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/Apple80211.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/airport -s)
Bash(# Пробую отримати повну інфу про мережі defaults read /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.airport.preferences)

Bash(python3 -c "
import objc
from CoreWLAN import CWInterface, CWNetwork

interface = CWInterface.interface\(\)
networks, error = interface.scanForNetworksWithName_error_\(''Ferraristraat11'', None\)
if networks:
    for n in networks:
        print\(f''{n.ssid\(\)} | BSSID: {n.bssid\(\)} | Channel: {n.wlanChannel\(\).channelNumber\(\)} | Signal: {n.rssiValue\(\)} dBm''\)
else:
    print\(''No networks found or error:'', error\)
")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MikroTik Audience mesh documentation

- Topology: Main + 2 repeaters in daisy chain with WiFi backup
- CAPsMAN configuration with band steering \(10 dB difference\)
- Mesh failover scripts with centralized deployment via SFTP

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add scan results output to file

- wifi-scan.sh now saves results to wifi-scan-results.txt
- Added .gitignore for scan results

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
